|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, unpopulated,, 4-pin header,, internal,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 11/2013 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-620 ''DIR-620 (A1,D1 and F1)'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] : D-Link DIR-620/D/F1A : D-Link DIR-620 F1(MTK) REV.B *CPU: [[MediaTek MT7620N]] *RAM: 64 MiB DDR1 EM6AB160TSD *Flash: 8 MiB SPI MX25L6405D See also [[D-Link DIR-620]].. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===JTAG=== ====JTAG Pinouts==== *don't pins, but may connect to points on board (see picture). ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== {| | Pin | Value |- | 1 (key) | Vcc (+3.3 V) |- | 2 | Rx (Data Receive) |- | 3 | Tx (Data Transmit) |- | 4 | GND (Ground) |} ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:Dir620f1_pcb.jpg|PCB top
[[Has images::internal| ]] ==See also== ===Revisions=== 
Rev.	Chip			RAM	Flash
A1	Ralink   RT3052F 384MHz	32MB	8MB
B1	Ralink   RT3052F 384MHz	32MB	8MB
S/C1	Broadcom BCM5357 530MHz	64MB	8MB
D1	Ralink   RT3352F 400MHz	32MB	8MB
D/F1	MediaTek MT7620N 580MHz	64MB	8MB
S/G1	Broadcom BCM5357 500MHz	32MB    8MB
